# Billowing Skirt (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Bard Spells|Bard 2]], [[2nd Level Inquisitor Spells|Inquisitor 2]], [[2nd Level Occultist Spells|Occultist 2]], [[2nd Level Shaman Spells|Shaman 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Witch Spells|Witch 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 3]], [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, F (a skirt, kilt, or gown)

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Adventurer's Armory 2, pg. 21

A skirt, kilt, or gown you are wearing enables you to control your falls through the air. A creature wearing the enchanted item of clothing falls slowly as if affected by *[[Feather Fall (Ninja Trick)|feather fall]]* and can attempt a DC 15 [[Fly (Skill)|Fly]] skill check as a move action to hover in place for 1 round.
